information privacy law: Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act

health legislation: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act

digital divide: information and communication technology for development

system development method: structured systems analysis and design method

information systems theory: theory of combined ontological completeness and overlap

IT security theory: selective organizational information privacy and security violations model

information systems theory: multi motive information systems continuance model

technology acceptance theory: unified theory of acceptance and use of technology

involvement theory: involvement conceptual and methodological perspectives theory

strategic management theory: resource based view of the firm
knowledge based theory of the firm

rational choice theory: theory of rational choice under uncertainty

creativity theory: cognitive network model of creativity theory

machine learning process: Cross-Industry Standard Process for Data Mining

data imputation: last observation carried forward data imputation
substitution by the mean data imputation

partial least squares path modeling: consistent partial least squares path modeling

autoregressive integrated moving average: seasonal autoregressive integrated moving average with exogenous regressor

level of measurement of location test: ordinal and numerical measurement of location test

Student's t-test: two sample t-test with equal variance
two sample t-test with unequal variance

Pearson's chi-squared test: Pearson's chi squared test of independence between categorical variables
Pearson's chi squared test of goodness of fit

post-hoc analysis: Tukey HSD for post poc analysis

between group comparison statistical tes: Conover-Iman test of multiple comparisons using rank sums

odds ratio homogeneity test: Breslow-Day test for homogeneity of odds ratio
Tarone's test for homogeneity of odds ratio

academic journal list: AIS senior scholars' basket of journals

design process: framework for evaluation in design science

goodness of fit index: root mean square error of approximation
